show_name: And you thought there is never a girl online? (TV)
other_title: Netoge no Yome wa Onna no ko ja Nai to Omotta? (Japanese)
ネトゲの嫁は女の子じゃないと思った？ (Japanese)
plot: Hideki Nishimura confessed to a person he thought was a girl online, only for that person to turn out to be a boy. He keeps this "black history" secret and swears to never to trust a "girl" online again. However, one day a girl online confesses to him, and it turns out she's actually a beautiful girl named Ako Tamaki. Ako cannot tell the difference between the online world and reality, and she is a loner who has trouble communicating. Hideki and his friends from his guild decide to work together to "correct" her.
opening_theme: "1st Love Story" by Luce Twinkle Wink☆
ending_theme: "Zero Ichi Kiseki" (ゼロイチキセキ; Zero One Miracle) by Yoshino Nanjou
